text:
Cellulant is a global FinTech
with presence in Africa.

We have customers in 35
countries in Africa today,
and we are looking to move
into newer markets outside of Africa.
AWS became really valuable

for us to be able to move
into newer markets faster

and to give our customers
access to our services
from wherever they are
without having to worry about reliability.
When we got onto Enterprise Support,

we realized that AWS
was really taking care
of its enterprise customers.

We got assigned a technical
account management team

who immediately took time
to understand our context,

our infrastructure, architecture,
our platform strategy,
our technical stack,
and they also quickly started to share
with us recommendations.

Those recommendations
have become vital for us
when designing our architecture,

and today, we really rely
on Enterprise Support

as a sounding board for
our architectural designs.
It was just a testament

to how seriously they
take our customer needs.
We were initially operating
from a centralized data center,
but now, because of moving to AWS Cloud,
we have been able to reach newer markets,
reach our customers in newer markets,
and that has enabled the business to grow.
